education.degree: Dual Degree : B.S. in Computer Science
Dual Degree : B.S. in Computer Science

bulletPoints: Led the migration of a legacy monolithic application to a modern micro-frontend architecture using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
Optimized website performance, reducing LCP by 40% and improving SEO rankings.
Mentored a team of 5 junior developers and implemented rigorous code review standards.
Collaborated with UX designers to build a comprehensive design system in Figma and React.
Developed responsive dashboard components using React and D3.js for data visualization.
Reduced bundle size by 25% through tree-shaking and lazy loading optimization.
Collaborated with the backend team to integrate RESTful APIs with frontend state management.

projects.name: E-Commerce Ultra
descriptions: Built a full-stack e-commerce platform with Next.js, Stripe, and Prisma.
Implemented real-time inventory management using WebSockets.
Designed a custom theme engine allowing users to toggle between 5 different UI modes.

projects.name: Dev Portfolio Framework
descriptions: Created a highly customizable portfolio template for developers using Next.js.
Integrated logic for dynamic content loading from a single JSON configuration file.
Achieved 100/100 Lighthouse scores across all categories.

activities.description: Organized weekly workshops, networking events, and annual hackathons for over 200 members.
Assisted in teaching 'Intro to Web Development' course, grading assignments and leading discussion sections.

skills.Frontend: React, Next.js, Vue.js, Tailwind CSS, Sass, Redux
skills.Tools & Services: Git, Docker, AWS, Firebase, Figma, Vercel
